CustomField.formula: IF( Team_Threshold_Met__c , IF( CS_Attribution_Amount__c >= Tier_1_Threshold__c , Tier_1_Bonus__c ,0) , 0)+IF( Team_Threshold_Met__c , IF( CS_Attribution_Amount__c >= Tier_2_Threshold__c , Tier_2_Bonus__c ,0) , 0)+IF( Team_Threshold_Met__c , IF( CS_Attribution_Amount__c >= Tier_3_Threshold__c , Tier_3_Bonus__c ,0) , 0)+IF( Team_Threshold_Met__c , IF( CS_Attribution_Amount__c >= Tier_4_Threshold__c , Tier_4_Bonus__c ,0) , 0)+ Team_Bonus__c
CustomField.label: Current Incentive
